short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool for calculating pump sizing and specifications

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pump Sizing Calculator is a powerful and easy-to-use Chrome extension designed to help engineers, technicians, and students accurately size pumps for various applications. Whether youâ€™re working in fluid systems, process engineering, or water management, this tool ensures efficient and precise pump selection by calculating essential parameters.

Features:

Accurate Pump Sizing: Calculate required flow rates, head pressure, and power for pump selection based on input parameters such as fluid properties and system requirements.

Customizable Input Options: Input data for flow rate, pipe diameter, system pressure, and fluid type to get tailored results.

Unit Conversion: Effortlessly switch between units like cubic meters/hour, gallons/minute, kPa, and psi for seamless calculations.

Save & Compare Options: Save multiple pump sizing calculations and compare results to determine the most efficient solution.

Intuitive Interface: A user-friendly design with step-by-step input guides for precise and quick results.

Offline Mode: Perform pump sizing calculations even when offline.

Recent Calculations: Keep track of your last few calculations for reference and reuse.


Applications:

Industrial fluid systems and process design

HVAC systems and water distribution networks

Engineering studies and academic research

Pump selection for irrigation and municipal systems


Get started with Pump Sizing Calculator to save time, improve efficiency, and ensure proper pump selection for any project!
